thread.title: Good hotel for family with children with reasonable price
thread.title_full: Good hotel for family with children with reasonable price - Review of First Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Krishna J
title: Good hotel for family with children with reasonable price
text: Nice location, in front of Metro station. Most of the attractions are within walking distance, many restaurants around the hotel. Staffs are nice,rooms are clean and neat. Price is reasonable, good breakfast
